name: codeanywhere-docs
description: This is the repo for the documentation for [Codeanywhere](https://codeanywhere.com/), a powerful online IDE.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run tsc && npm run copy-assets
scripts.dev:start: npx kill-port 3000 && npm run build && npm start
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src -e ts,ejs,md --exec npm run dev:start
